title: Edwardian Era Begins
description: The Edwardian era starts in the UK, known for elegance and refinement.

title: Poiret Births Modernism
description: Paul Poiret influences modern fashion with innovative designs.

title: The Flapper Revolution
description: Women adopt shorter skirts and bobbed hairstyles, symbolizing freedom.

title: Hollywood Glamour
description: Golden Age of Hollywood defines new styles in film and fashion.

title: Utility and Wartime Fashion
description: Clothing designed for practicality during wartime restrictions.

title: Rise of Punk and Street Fashion
description: Youth culture influences punk fashion and streetwear trends.

title: Power Dressing
description: Business suits and bold colors dominate the workplace fashion.

title: Digital Fashion Era
description: Fashion merges with digital culture and online platforms.
